definitions.title: chamber
definitions.body: (NH id., perhaps Aramaism, cf. Ar. ma3wany dwell, 0’away abode (? akin to 0awowno0 turn aside to lodge, [[אַוְונׇא]], tawono0 lodging-place), Aram. [[תָּוׇן]] (in Ez Eze 40 [[תְּוׇא]], [[תָּוַיׇּא]]), 4teq room, chamber);—´[[ת]]: abs. Ez Eze 40:7 +, cstr. 1Ki 4:28; sf. [[תאו]] Ez Eze 40:21 Kt (Qr [[תָּאָיו]]), so v:Eze 40:29, v:Eze 40:33, v:Eze 40:36; pl. [[תָּאִים]] v:Eze 40:7 +; [[תָּאוֹת]] v:Eze 40:12; cstr. [[תָּאֵי]] v:Eze 40:10;—chamber: [[תָּא]] [[הָרָחִים]] 1Ki 4:28 chamber of the guards = 2Ch 12:11; in Ezekiel’s temple: Ez Eze 40:7, Eze 40:7, Eze 40:10, Eze 40:12, Eze 40:12, Eze 40:13; Eze 40:16, Eze 40:21, Eze 40:29, Eze 40:33, Eze 40:36.
